name: 2.15 "And Coachie Makes Three" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Did Norm and Cliff go out with the women in the cold opening?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The girls were interested in the two men. The men got tongue-tied so the women left them.

questions.text: Who showed up at Diane's house?
questions.explanation:
Coach.

	Coach showed up to watch a movie with Sam. Diane was in her intimate apparel and not overly happy to see Coach in her living room.

questions.text: What movies did Sam and Coach always watch together?
questions.explanation:
Robert Mitchum movies.

	Robert Mitchum made more than 170 movies. Sam and Coach had a long standing rule that no matter what whenever one of his movies was on to stop everything and watch it.

questions.text: Why was Coach standing outside the door?
questions.correct: His coat was caught in the door.
options: He had no where else to go.
questions.explanation:
His coat was caught in the door.

	Coach didn't want to bother Sam and Diane again so he was standing outside the door. Sam and Diane opened the door to go chase Coach only to find he never left.

questions.text: What movie did the three watch together?
questions.explanation:
Thunder Road.

	Robert Mitchum played Lucas Doolin in "Thunder Road". The movie was made in 1958.

questions.text: What did Diane say Sam shaved off?
questions.explanation:
his Pantuso.

	Coach's last name was Pantuso. His real first name was Ernie.

Katherine.

	Sam and Diane decided to set Coach up with a woman so that he would give them some space. This was a hilarious scene in which Coach kept forgetting who the woman he was interested in was. They finally tracked her down however.

questions.correct: Diane and Sam fight over Coach
options: Diane and Carla fight over Sam
Sam and Coach fight over Norm
Norm and Cliff fight over Paul
questions.explanation:
Diane and Sam fight over Coach.

	Neither of them wanted to be the bad guy and tell Coach to stay away. Later on, when Coach said it was a good thing they did, they tried subtly to get all the credit for it.

Eve Roberts.

	Eve Roberts has guest starred on many TV shows. She played Mrs. Martin on an episode of "Family Ties".

questions.text: Who was the associate producer of this episode?
questions.explanation:
Tim Berry.

	Tim Berry also produced episodes of "Becker". "Becker" also starred "Cheers" star Ted Danson in the title role.
